article_title: Downtown spa, salon offers high-end service at affordable prices
article_text:
Norman, OK (73070)

Today

Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. A stray severe thunderstorm is possible. High 83F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms. A few storms may be severe. Low 66F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

article_metadata.author: Sarah Kirby  Transcript Staff Writer

og.description: Melissa Barett has one of the best jobs in Norman. She’s a hair and makeup stylist at Aesthetica, a new full-service spa and salon in the historic district.
